Muhamadjon has been involved in providing a passenger transportation service from one city to another for over two years.  At first, he worked in a leased car and then bought himself a car.  Currently, he works in his own car.  Muhamadjon is requesting this loan to buy a new car and spare parts.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy a car and spare parts

loans.name: Mansour

texts.en: Mansour is a 32-year-old married man, with 2 children. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has been operating a sewing store which sews men's fabrics for 6 years. He is requeting a loan of 100,000 YER to buy men's fabrics for his business so he can sell clothes to improve his social and economic level as well as enroll his children in school.

loans.use: to buy men's fabrics for his business.

loans.name: Ayda

texts.en:
Ayda is a 38-year-old married woman. There are four in her family, and they live in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Ayda is requesting a loan of 700 JOD from Tamweelcom. She will use the loan to fix up her family’s home.

loans.use: to fix up her family’s home.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 30-year-old single woman who lives in Baqa'a, Jordan. She has an embroidery business.

Sahar is requesting a 500 JOD loan to buy more raw materials for her business. In the future, she hopes to expand and open her own store.

loans.use: to buy embroidery materials

loans.name: Fathyeh

texts.en:
Fathyeh is a 41-year-old married woman and the mother of three children. She lives in Al Aqaba, Jordan. This photo is of her son because she is a conservative woman and does not wish to upload her photo on the internet.

Fathyeh is requesting a loan of 400 JOD from Tamweelcom to buy more mobile recharge cards to sell. She hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more mobile recharge cards to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials for craft making to respond to customer demand.

loans.name: Pairav

texts.ru: Пайрав трудолюбивый, добрый и честный человек, на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 4-х лет он занимается купле- продажей  крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Закупает скот на рынке и откармливает их дома в течении недели, затем продает за выгодную цену. Иногда жена помогает мужу в свободное время. Пайрав хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала и расширения бизнеса. Пайрав надеется, что вы поддержите его и поможете ему продвигаться вперед по бизнесу.
texts.en: Pairav is a hardworking, kind and honest person, who is raising one child.  His wife is involved in household work.  He has been involved in buying and selling cattle and small livestock for over four years.  He buys livestock at a market and fattens it up at home for a week, and then sells it at an advantageous price.  Sometimes, his wife helps him during her free time.  Pairav wants to obtain this loan to buy livestock in order to refill his working capital and expand his business. Pairav hopes that you would support him and help him to move ahead in his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to refill his working capital

loans.name: Abdulkhalg

texts.en:
Abdulkhalg, 33, is a married man with four children. He lives in Sana'a, Yemen where he works selling chickens. The idea for the business came 10 years ago, when he acquired much experience. When he went off on his own to earn income, he did not think of anything but to start a micro-business dedicated to selling chickens. His business is located in a strategic center – a very busy commercial area. 

In his business selling chickens, Abdulkhalg has become known for good customer service. This has permitted him to have a large clientele and guaranteed good sales. Because of this, his business has grown little by little. He is currently asking for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to buy chickens for his business. He wants to offer better variety to his customers and thus increase his sales. He hopes that in this way his business will continually capitalize itself and his earnings increase. He hopes that with more income his family can enjoy a better quality of life and have better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy chickens for his business

loans.name: Reham

texts.en:
Reham, 37 years old and a married woman, cares for five sons and daughters. 

Reham is doing a small good retail business selling toys, home products and cosmetic products. 

She has applied for this loan to add more toys to sell to the kids in their neighborhood.

loans.use: to add more toys to what she sells

loans.name: Tamam

texts.en:
Tamam, 42 years old and a housewife, cares for four sons and daughters. Her husband has recently retired from the private sector and is looking for a job to be able to support the family. That’s why Tamam started her business to help her husband in supporting the family and get their children into schools.

Tamam has applied for this loan to buy more home products so she can have more variety in the products she is selling.

loans.use: to buy more home products

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is 22 years old and a conservative lady, so  she has asked her husband Baker to appear in the photo instead.

Heba and Baker have one baby boy. Baker is studying and training in the Airline Academy, and Heba has applied for this loan to help her husband pay for his educational fees so he can graduate and start working in the airline business.

loans.use: to help her husband pay his educational fees

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is 51 years old and a widow. She is responsible for one person, and she lives in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Amal is looking to have a loan of 700 JOD thus she can improve her home living conditions.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Arafat

texts.en:
Arafat is a 25-year-old guy who lives with his older brother and sister. He opened his own clothing store two years ago in a local market where it has good visibility. Arafat has experience working in clothing sales and he prefers to have his own business rather than working for others.

Arafat is requesting a youth loan to improve his store's decor and lighting system.

loans.use: to enhance his store's decor and lighting

loans.name: Jawahir

texts.en:
Jawahir is 53 year old and widowed. She is still caring for two sons and a daughter who live with her. To be able to support the family and put some food on the table, she started a small, home-based business selling clothing.  

Jawahir is requesting a loan to expand her business, increase the quantity of clothing she has, and expand her summer collection.

loans.use: to expand her clothing collection

loans.name: Alia

texts.en:
Alia is a 38-year-old married woman who has a son and a daughter. Her husband works in a supermarket while she farms. She has a greenhouse in which she grows different kinds of vegetables.

Alia has applied for an 1800 JOD loan from the National Microfinance Bank. With it she will build another greenhouse so she can grow more vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to build another greenhouse.

loans.name: Elham

texts.en:
Elham is a thirty-year-old housewife who cares for three daughters and a son. Her husband is a taxi driver.

Elham started a small business at home making and arranging artificial flowers to sell. She has applied for a 700 JOD youth loan from the National Microfinance Bank to buy more materials for making her flowers.

loans.use: to buy more materials for making her flowers.

loans.name: Marvin Jonathan

texts.es:
El señor Marvin Jonathan esta soltero, tiene 29 años de edad, cursó sus estudio de educación media, se dedica a la carpintería, inicio como operario, lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de madera y poder tener mas producción, espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande y bien equipado.
texts.en:
Marvin Jonathan is 29 years old and single, and has completed some secondary school education. He makes a living as a carpenter, a trade that be started working in as an operator, and he now has 5 years of experience.

He is requesting this loan in order to purchase wood, which he plans to use to make furniture and other carpentry products. He hopes to grow his business into a large and well–equipped operation.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Fatmeh is a conservative lady and she has asked her mother, Noufah, to appear in this photo. She is 35 years old and single, with four sisters and two brothers. Fatmeh works as a school bus attendant, but her salary is not enough to help her family financially. She therefore started a small home business where she sells home products such as glasses, plates, cups, vases, and other items. Her mother helps while Fatmeh is at work.

Fatmeh is requesting a loan to buy more home products to sell. She is still in the process of launching her business and is focusing on serving her neighbors and friends first.

loans.use: to buy home products to sell

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.en:
Marcelo is from Capatan. He is married and has four children. To meet his family's needs, Marcelo raises hogs to fatten, breed and sell. He has been doing so for over seven years and earns about 4,000 PHP for each hog. He has spent his income wisely on food and school fees.

Marcelo would like to develop his business, but he hasn’t enough money to do so. So he is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy feed, medicine and vaccines to ensure his hogs’ health. If the hogs grow well, he can sell them at a higher price and so increase his income.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicine and vaccines for his hogs.

loans.name: Judy Elena

texts.es:
Judy es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 5 años que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia. Hace un tiempo montó su venta de huevos, para lo cual tiene una cantidad de gallinas que le permiten tener muy buenas ventas. Judy sufrió un accidente y esto hizo que se tuviera que trasladar a vivir a la finca donde su familia, puesto que tuvo que ser intervenida quirúrgicamente en varias oportunidades. Ahora ya se encuentra recuperada, con muy buen estado de salud y por esto quiere retomar con gran entusiasmo su negocio para hacerlo crecer. Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar más gallinas para poder incrementar su capacidad de producción de huevos y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes por los huevos.

De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, además de que su negocio resurgirá y podrá salir adelante. Además, Judy espera que con mayores ingresos su hijo pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una mejor educación. Judy sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda utilizar toda la capacidad que pueda para sacarlo adelante y así ofrecerle a su hijo un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Judy is a single mother and is the head of the family of her 5-year-old-son.  She has had to go through many adversities in her life; nevertheless, she has always had the strength to get ahead and to continue progressing with her family.  Some time ago she set up her business of selling eggs, for which she had a quantity of chickens that allowed her to have good sales.  

Judy suffered from an accident and this made her have to go live on the farm with her family since she had to be operated on several times.  Now she is recovering and is in a good state of health, which is the reason she wants to return to her business with great enthusiasm to make it grow.  This is why she seeks a loan that will allow her to buy more chickens in order to increase her production capacity of eggs and thus respond to her customers' demand for eggs.  This way her sales will increase considerably and, in addition to this, her business will resurface and she will be able to get ahead in life.  

Furthermore, Judy hopes that with a higher income her son will be able to have a better quality of life and access to a better education.  Judy dreams to have a great business where she would be able to use as much capacity as she can to get ahead in life and to offer her son a stable financial future.

loans.use: to buy more chickens so that she can increase her production capacity of eggs and thus respond to her customers' demand for eggs.

loans.name: Juan Milton

texts.es:
El señor Juan Milton esta soltero, tiene 26 años de edad, estudio mecánica automotriz, se dedica a presta sus servicios de enderezado y pintura, este es su profesión y lleva 6 años de experiencia.


Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de pinturas de varios colores, que sera utilizado para mejorar su trabajo y instar mas autos. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Juan Milton is single, 26 years old, and he studied to be an automobile mechanic. He uses his skills to repair and paint auto bodies. This is his profession and he has 6 years of experience at it.

Juan Milton is requesting a loan to buy automobile paints of various colors, to be used to improve his work and attract more auto repair business. He hopes to  have a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy automobile paint for his body shop.

loans.name: Maria Rubiela

texts.es:
Maria tiene un hogar comunitario desde hace aproximadamente 19 años donde cuida aproximadamente 15 niños entre edades de 2 y 5 años, quienes provienen de familias con escasos recursos económicos. Con su labor, puede mejorarles la calidad de vida tanto a los niños como a los padres que deben trabajar durante gran parte del día, lo que ha hecho que tenga un gran reconocimiento y cariño por parte de las personas del sector. 

Con el ánimo de ofrecer un mejor servicio, Maria busca que un préstamo le permita realizar mejoras locativas a su hogar de modo que pueda tener mejores espacios para el cuidado de los niños.

De esta manera podrá tener un mejor servicio y así podrá seguir trabajando de la mejor manera, además de que podrá incluir a un número mayor de niños para poder mejorarles la calidad de vida a muchas más personas.
texts.en:
Maria has operated a daycare for about 19 years, where she takes care of approximately 15 children between the ages of 2 and 5, all of whom come from families with very little financial resources. She works hard to care for the kids and improve their quality of life, as well as the quality of life for their parents, since her care for children allows their parents to work their daytime jobs without worrying about their children. She is well known in the community for her kindness and hard work.

In hopes of offering better services to the children and their families, Maria is requesting this loan, which she plans to put towards repairs and improvements to her home, creating nicer spaces for the children.
  
She hopes that these repairs will improve her overall service quality and allow her to care for a larger group of children, improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to repair and improve her daycare facility, offering nicer spaces for the children.

loans.name: Seham

texts.en:
Seham is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo. Her husband appears in this photo. Seham is 42 years old and is married with four children. She lives in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan, and runs a business selling home products.

Seham is requesting a 700 JOD loan to buy more quantities of home products to sell. In the future, she hopes to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy home products to sell

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 36 years old, married and has one young child. His business involves raising hogs for future sale, each one earning him P3,000, just enough to sustain his family's meal requirements and to pay their bills.

Daniel is requesting a loan of P10,000 to purchase an additional piglet to raise and pay for its feed and vaccines. Daniel works hard to make his business profitable and hopes to someday achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy an additional piglet to raise and pay for its feed and vaccines.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.en:
Florencio is a 46-year-old married man who, along with his wife, works hard to earn a living. Involved in agriculture since his high school graduation, Florencio now runs his own rice farming business. He aims to uplift his family from poverty and educate his two children.

In order to help achieve his goals, Florencio is requesting a loan of P15,000 to buy seeds, insecticides and herbicides to improve his rice production. He is hopeful that he can achieve increased profits in order to better support his family's needs and help his children attain a higher level of education.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides and herbicides to improve his rice production.

loans.name: Arte

texts.en:
Arte has been a farmer for almost ten years. He is proud of his ability to both raise hogs and sell fish.

Arte is applying for a loan of 15,000 PHP from ASKI. He will use this amount to buy farm supplies and pay for hiring farm laborers. He knows that his businesses will grow through his access to financial services from ASKI and KIVA lenders.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and to pay for labor cost of transplanting and land preparation of  his farm land

loans.name: Primo

texts.en:
Primo is 47 years old and married with four children. All of his children attend school.

Primo raises and breeds hogs in Capatan, the village where he lives. Once he fattens them to the desired weight, he offers them to butchers. He usually gets about 4,000 PHP per hog.

Primo want to raise more pigs and ensure their health so he can sell them at a higher price. To do so, he is borrowing 15,000 PHP from ASKI to buy feed and vaccines for his hogs.

With increased profits Primo is confident he can give his children the best education possible. He knows this will mean a brighter future for them.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for his hogs.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is 54-year-old married woman who is a rice farmer. With her husband, she plants and harvests rice to sell to traders. 

Mila is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to buy fertilizer and insecticide to improve her crop production. Her loan will help her to grow a healthier crop and offer her harvest at a good price. In the future, Mila hopes to keep growing rice and increase her income to sustain her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a farmer at General Balao. She works with her husband Richard and they started planting and harvesting rice five years ago. They are very thankful for their income that they have used to pay the school fees of their child who is still in elementary school. 

Luzviminda is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to maintain her farm and buy rice seed, fertilizer, and pesticide. She hopes her loan will boost her income and she plans to harvest abundant crop to improve her family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy rice seed, fertilizer, and pesticide

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is a responsible wife who is married to Randy. The couple is hoping to have children soon, but they have no children yet. For the past five years, Marina and her husband have been rice farmers. They own a two-hectare farm where they plant and harvest rice to sell to traders in their village. They use their income for meals and to provide revolving capital for the next planting season. They also hire laborers to help them transplant and harvest their crop. 

Marina is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to pay for land preparation, rice seeds to plant, and fertilizer. She will use these products to maintain her farming business. In the future, Marina would like to achieve plentiful harvests so that she can save funds to use in times of emergencies.

loans.use: to buy rice seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Rosalba De Jesus

texts.es:
Rosalba ha atravesado por muchas adversidades en su vida para poder sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos, pero gracias a sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante ha superado estas dificultades y continuar progresando con su familia. Madre soltera cabeza de hogar Rosalba debe garantizar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos en su hogar, es por esto que se esfuerza diariamente en su negocio para poder tener una buena calidad de vida. La actividad de la confección la aprendió desde que tenía aproximadamente 15 años, pues su madre se dedicaba a esta actividad y se la enseñó desde muy joven. Desde entonces, Rosalba viene trabajando en esta actividad, primero al lado de su madre, luego de manera independiente, y gracias a esto puede tener sus propios ingresos. Sus principales productos son los uniformes, tanto para colegios como para el hospital de su municipio, y debido a que tiene un gran pedido por parte de uno de sus clientes, Rosalba busca que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de materiales e insumos como telas e hilos para confeccionar un gran pedido de uniformes que le ha hecho un cliente suyo.

De esta manera su negocio podrá seguir saliendo adelante y así seguir garantizando unos ingresos en su hogar con los que podrá tener una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosalba has faced much adversity in her life trying to support her 2 children, but thanks to her desire to work and get ahead she has overcome these difficulties and kept moving forward with her family. As a single mother and head of household, Rosalba must ensure there is sufficient income to pay the household expenses, so she works hard everyday at her business to have a better life.

She learned tailoring when she was about 15 because her mother was a dressmaker and taught Rosalba the trade while she was a teenager. Since then,  Rosalba has been working at this trade, first at her mother's side, and then independently. With this training, she has her own income. Her main products are uniforms for both high schools and hospitals in her city, and she has a large order from one of her customers. Rosalba is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy materials and supplies such as fabric and thread to fill a large order for uniforms from her customer. Her business will, therefore, continue to thrive and provide some income for her household with which she can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies such as fabric and thread to fill a large order for uniforms from her customer.

loans.name: Flor Rocio

texts.es:
Flor se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace un largo tiempo y con esta actividad genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente en su hogar para el sostenimiento de los gastos de sus 3 hijos. En su taller ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros principalmente ropa interior y prendas deportivas y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado tener muy buenos pedidos, lo que le brinda la oportunidad de generar un empleo para una persona muy necesitada; sin embargo, pese a que genera un empleo en su taller, su capacidad de producción es muy baja debido al faltante de una máquina, es por esto que Flor busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una máquina recubridora y materia prima para poder aumentar su capacidad de producción y poder responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio se hará más eficiente y así podrá tener mejor calidad en el trabajo y mejores tiempos de entrega. Además, con mayores ingresos su familia podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Flor makes a living as a seamstress, and has much experience in her craft. She puts her income from her sewing business toward household expenses and providing for her three children. At her workshop she makes a wide variety of products, including underwear, sports jerseys and apparel. Her high quality work has led to a steady stream of customer orders, and has allowed her to generate income. Even though she runs a successful workshop, her production capacity is low, because she does not have a coating machine. Flor is requesting this loan in order to purchase a coating machine and other input materials for making clothing items. 

She hopes that this new machine will make her process more efficient, and will allow her to speed up her production times, offering improved services to her clients. In addition, with increased income, she hopes that her family will enjoy a better quality of life and greater opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to purchase a coating machine and raw materials to increase her production capacity and attend to customer demands.

loans.name: Romelo

texts.en:
Romelo raises rice in his local community. He has been farming for the past five years and his main priorities are to let his children finish their studies and improve his family's way of living.

Romelo is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to buy necessary farm supplies to ensure the proper growth and nutrition of his crop. In the future, he hopes to obtain a bigger farm plot to cultivate and earn a bigger profit to save for the bright future of his two children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa es madre soltera cabeza de familia de 4 hijos, pues su esposo murió hace un tiempo dejándola a cargo de las obligaciones en su hogar; a pesar de que algunos de sus 4 hijos ya son mayores y pueden acceder a un empleo para pagar sus propios estudios. Hace mucho tiempo que viene desarrollando la actividad de la venta de arepas, la cual le permitía en un principio contribuir económicamente en su hogar para sostener los gastos que se generaban, pero desde la muerte de su esposo se vio en la obligación de tener otra fuente de ingresos y fue así como montó una chaza de venta de dulces la cual ubica en el parque principal de su municipio. Con estos negocios ya puede generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos en su hogar, aunque aún tiene grandes dificultades de capital; es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita arreglar la chaza de dulces que tiene hace aproximadamente 8 años y comprar un motor para hacer arepas.

De esta manera sus negocios podrá ser más eficientes y así poder generar todos los ingresos que se necesitan en su hogar para poder tener una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is a single mother and the head of her family of four children. Her husband died some time ago, so she was left in charge of the household obligations. Some of her children are already grown and able to get a job to help pay for their own studies. A long time ago, Rosa started a business selling "arepas" (flat cornbread served with various fillings). This was her primary means of earning money, but when her husband died, she was obligated to acquire an additional source of income. She set up a mobile kiosk for selling candy at the main park in the city. With these businesses, Rosa is able to generate enough income to maintain the household expenses.

Since she has great difficulty accessing capital, Rosa is seeking a loan in order to repair the mobile kiosk she has owned for approximately eight years and to buy a grain mill motor so that she can process corn for making "arepas". By obtaining this loan, Rosa's businesses will be more efficient and generate all the household income she needs to have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to her mobile kiosk and to purchase a grain mill motor.

loans.name: Gs El Porvenir Iii Group

texts.es:
La Joven Lisseth tiene 23 años y vive en la zona sur de Honduras, ella  es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, junto con ella vive su hermano y su madre quien la respalda en la venta de Ropa Nueva, como también con cada una de sus responsabilidades, su actividad la hace de de manera ambulante, ya que visita barrios y colonias de la ciudad donde reside, como también lugares aledaños y también meloneras y azucareras de la zona, ya que por la calidad de sus producto tiene mucha demanda. el crédito Lisseth lo necesita para la compra de: camisas, bóxer, tobilleras, blusas, pantalones, calzonetas etc. el impacto que espera en su negocio con el crédito, es que se incrementen sus ventas, ya que comprara una gran variedad de productos para así de esta manera, poder satisfacer la demanda de cada uno de sus clientes, y generarse mejores ingresos, para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Los planes a futuro de Lisseth es trabajar día con día para hacer crecer su negocio y ayudar a su familia.
 
Oscar se dedica a la venta de productos de aluminio.
Elvin se dedica a la venta de mercadería  variada  y ropa usada.
Choluteca, Honduras – Abril del 2012
texts.en:
Lisseth is 23 years old and lives in the southern area of Honduras. She is a very hardworking and responsible person. She lives with her brother as well as her mother, who supports her in the sale of new clothing as well as in all of her responsibilities. 
She sells her merchandise on the street, visiting different areas and neighborhoods in the city where she lives, as well as adjacent places, and also melon companies and sugar refineries in the area, because there is high demand for her products due to their good quality. 
Lisseth needs the loan to purchase shirts, boxers, socks, blouses, pants, underpants, etc. She hopes the loan will impact her business by increasing her sales, because she is going to buy a great variety of products so that she can satisfy each of her clients' demand and generate a better income for herself, in order to achieve a better quality of life. 
Lisseth's plan for the future is to work day by day so that her business can grow and she can help her family. 
 
Oscar works selling aluminum products.
Elvin works selling assorted merchandise and used clothing. 

Choluteca, Honduras – April, 2012

loans.use: to purchase shirts, boxers, socks, blouses, pants, and underpants for her business.

loans.name: Lilia Sarahi

texts.es:
La joven Lilia de 24 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene una hija que depende de ella, vive en casa de sus suegros donde tiene un pequeño negocio de pulpería, ubicado en una colonia de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Lilia, su negocio es una pulpería donde vende todo lo relacionado a la canasta familiar, sus ventas son de lunes a domingo, sus clientes a diario le visitan para comprar lo que nesecitan en su hogar, solicita el préstamo para la compra de maíz, plásticos, frescos, embutidos y lacteos que son productos que sus clientes le están pidiendo y son los que mueve mas en su pulpería.
Con las ganancias de este préstamo Lilia pretende capitalizar mas su negocio y seguir adelante con su familia. 
Su sueño es mejorar su negocio y que su hija siga sus estudios.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril del 2012
texts.en:
Lilia, 24, is a single mother who supports her daughter. She lives in her in-law's house, where she has a small grocery business, in a neighborhood in the city of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. Lilia's business is a household goods store that is open Monday to Sunday. Her customers shop daily for the things they need for their homes. 

She is requesting a loan to buy corn, plastic items, soft drinks, sausages, and milk products for her business, which are the products her customer are asking for and which she sells most often. With the profits from this loan, Lilia will invest more in her business and support her family. She dreams of improving her business and seeing her daughter continue her education.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - April, 2012

loans.use: to buy corn, plastic items, soft drinks, sausages, and milk products for her business.

loans.name: Gs Tapaire Ii Group

texts.es:
La Señora Yenis, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, junto con ella vive sus hijos y su esposo quienes le ayudan en sus ventas. Su negocio se encuentra en un punto muy estratégico, ya que se encuentra en el centro de la aldea donde vive, y esto se presta para que sea muy visitado. El crédito lo necesita para la compra de: refrescos, cerdos, maíz, dulce, leche, cuajada, leña etc. el impacto esperado con el crédito, es comprar variedad de producto, y así de esta manera incrementar sus ventas, de igual manera contrarrestar los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes todos los días.
Los planes a futuro de Yenis son crecer en su negocio propio, y poder colocar una pulpería, y  generarse mejores ingresos, para tener una mejor calidad de vida, para ella y su familia.
Helmer, se dedica a tiempo completo a su pulpería.
David, tiene su negocio de comedor y lo atiende el todos los días.
Choluteca, Honduras - Abril del 2012
texts.en:
Yenis lives in the southern part of Honduras with her children and her husband, who help her with her sales.  Her business is located in a very strategic spot, because it is in the center of the town where they live, and so is in a place where many people pass through.  The loan that she needs is for the purpose of buying: soft drinks, pigs, corn, sweets, milk, cheese curds, firewood, etc.  With this loan, she hopes to buy a variety of products so that she can increase her sales, and also have on hand the goods she needs to fill the orders that her customers place each day. 

In the future, Yenis plans to grow her business and establish a grocery store to generate a better income so that she and her family can have a better quality of life.

The other group members are: Helmer, who works full-time in his grocery store, and David, who has an eatery that he tends to each day.

Choluteca, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, pigs, corn, sweets, milk, cheese curds, firewood, etc.

loans.name: Gs Bendecidos Por Dios Group

texts.es:
El Señor Santos, tiene 36 años de edad tiene 2 hijos, y cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja en el manejo de su negocio, Su actividad principal es la venta de abarroteria (pulpería) tiene 3 años de experiencia en el manejo de su negocio, Don Santos esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de Arroz, Frijoles, Lácteos, embutidos, condimentos, manteca y otros productos para la buena atención de sus clientes, Santos es una persona muy trabajadora y su negocio esta ubicado en su casas de habitación, contando con toda la clientela de la zona donde el habita siendo su principal fuente de ingresos, con el préstamo Don Santos le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Don Santos sueña con tener el  mejor negocio de la zona para darle una mejor vida a su familia.
La Señora Irene,  se dedica a la venta de verduras, mantequilla, queso, charamuscas y cerdos.
El Señor Manuel, se dedica a la venta de abarroteria (pulpería) y la venta de cerdos.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Santos is 36 years old and has two children. He counts on his spouse's support in managing his business. His main activity is selling groceries. 
Santos has three years of experience in managing his business, and he is requesting the loan in order to purchase rice, beans, sausages, herbs and spices, lard, and other products, so that he can offer good service to his customers.
Santos is a very hard worker and his business is located in his home. It is his main source of income and attracts all the customers in the area where he lives. The loan will help Santos have a better business, so that he can earn a higher income in order to cover home expenses and give his family a better quality of life. Santos' dream is to have the best business in the area so that he can give his family a better life.

Irene works selling vegetables, butter, cheese, frozen juice bags, and pigs.
Manuel works selling groceries and pigs.

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - April, 2012

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, dairy products, sausages, herbs and spices, lard, and other products for his business.

loans.name: Gs Las Vegas Ii Group

texts.es:
La Señora Amelia, tiene 55 años de edad, no tiene hijos dependientes, esta casada, Su actividad principal es la caficultura, ella tiene 3 manzanas de finca de café desde hace más de 21 años, Doña Amelia esta solicitando el crédito para el mantenimiento de su finca de café para compra de fertilizantes, plaguicidas y pago de empleados  para  mejorar la productividad de su finca ya que por la falta de financiamiento no le ha podido dar el mantenimiento adecuado, con el apoyo solicitado del que reciba doña Amelia, le contribuirá a tener una mejor producción de café en su finca, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, ella junto a su esposo han trabajado  muy duro para contar con el patrimonio familiar ya que en esta actividad se tiene que trabajar muy duro, uno de los sueños de Doña Amelia es tener una de los mejores fincas tecnificadas de la zona.
Héctor, tiene 2 manzanas de café cosecheros cuenta con una experiencia.
Teresa, cuenta con 4 manzanas de café y tiene 30 años de dedicarse a esta actividad.
Dennis, Tiene 2 manzanas de café y desde su niñez tiene el conocimiento del manejo de esta actividad.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Amelia, 55, is married and has no dependent children. Her main business is growing coffee, and for more than 21 years, she has had a coffee farm that covers 3 manzanas. Amelia is requesting a loan to maintain her farm, by purchasing  fertilizers and insecticides for the business, and to pay the employees so that she can improve the farm's productivity. Lack of adequate financing has prevented her from adequately maintaining the farm.

The requested loan will allow Amelia to increase the farm's coffee production; therefore, she will earn more income to cover household expenses and provide a better life for her family. She and her husband have worked very hard for this family asset because it is a business that requires hard work. One of Amelia's dreams is to have one of the area's best farms.

Héctor has 2 manzanas of coffee plantings and experience as a harvester.
Teresa, who has 4 manzanas of coffee plantings, has 30 years of experience in this sector. 
Dennis, who has 2 manzanas of coffee plantings, has been working at this activity since childhood.

Danli, El Paraíso, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides for the business and to pay the employees.

loans.name: Jhon Fredy

texts.es:
Jhon Fredy se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años de edad. Trabaja en la actividad de la carnicería desde hace aproximadamente 10 años, la cual aprendió gracias a que un amigo suyo se la enseñó, y con el ánimo de progresar económicamente, desde hace aproximadamente 1 semana montó su propia carnicería con unos equipos arrendados y algunas herramientas compradas. Con el ánimo de surtir mejor su negocio, dado el poco capital que tiene, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar surtido de carne para poder tener buena variedad de carnes para ofrecer a sus clientes en la carnicería.

De esta manera podrá sacar adelante su negocio y así poder tener mejores ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Jhon Fredy espera que en su negocio pueda generar empleo y también este le brinde la oportunidad de brindarles a sus 2 hijos el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Jhon Fredy is married and has 2 children, aged 10 and 8.  He has been working in a butcher shop for about 10 years.  He learned this trade from a friend, and motivated by a desire for economic progress, he started up his own butcher shop about a week ago with some rented equipment and tools that he bought.  In order to better stock his business, given the small amount of capital he has, he is seeking a loan that will allow him to purchase meat so that he can have a good variety of meat to offer the customers who come to his store.

In this way, he will be able to get ahead with his business and have more income, so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.  In addition, Jhon Fredy hopes that his business will generate employment, and will also give him the opportunity to  provide his 2 children with access to a high quality education.

loans.use: to buy a variety of meat to stock up his butcher shop

loans.name: Guillermo Antonio

texts.es:
Guillermo se encuentra casado y tiene 6 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente en su negocio todos los días para generar ingresos que sean suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Desde hace aproximadamente 4 años se viene dedicando a la actividad de la agricultura; tiene unos cultivos de verduras los cuales se han caracterizado por ser de muy buena calidad y esto le ha permitido tener muy buena reputación entre sus clientes, lo que ha hecho que sus ventas cada vez vengan en aumento. Queriendo aprovechar el precio que tienen en el mercado sus verduras actualmente, Guillermo busca que un préstamo le permita comprar fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para sacar su cultivo adelante y poderlo vender a los buenos precios del momento.

De esta manera podrá recibir un muy buen dinero que le permitirá tener muy buena calidad de vida a su familia y así progresar poco a poco económicamente.
texts.en:
Guillermo is married and has six children.  He has always wanted to provide them with a better quality of life.  It is for this reason that he works hard in his business every day to make enough money to be able to cover the day-to-day expenses of his household.  For approximately the last four years he has been making his living as a farmer.  He has some plots where he grows vegetables of very high quality; this has earned him a very good reputation among his customers. This has resulted in a steady and continual increase in sales.  Wanting to take advantage of the current market prices for his vegetables, Guillermo is seeking a loan that will allow him to buy fertilizer, compost, insecticide and fungicide to improve his crop yields.  He will then be able to sell his crops at the best prices currently available.

In this way he will be able to make very good income, which will allow him to bring a very good quality of life his family and progress little by little economically.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, compost, insecticide and fungicide to improve his crop yields.

loans.name: Joao Joel

texts.es:
Joao se encuentra casado y tiene 1 hijo de 5 meses de nacido a quien le ha querido brindar todo lo necesario. En búsqueda de mejores oportunidades económicas, Joao llegó al municipio de Marinilla hace aproximadamente 4 meses ya que sus suegros se lo recomendaron y allí montó un negocio de comidas rápidas para generar ingresos con los cuales su familia pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su negocio lo montó con muy bajo capital, aún le hace falta comprar algunas cosas que requiere para preparar los productos como pizzas, hamburguesas y otros más, es por esto que ahora que ve que su negocio esta saliendo adelante que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar insumos para la preparación de las comidas rápidas y comprar utensilios de trabajo necesarios para seguir desempeñando su actividad.

De esta manera su negocio podrá seguir saliendo adelante, y además de esto podrá comenzar a ofrecer mayor variedad de productos diversificando su oferta. Su sueño es sacar su negocio adelante y que este le permita generar ingresos con los cuales su familia pueda acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Joao’s married and has a five-month-old son who he wants to provide with everything necessary.  Seeking better economic opportunities, Joao came to the municipality of Marinilla about four months ago because his in-laws recommended it to him and he set up a fast-food business there to generate income so that his family could have a better quality of life.

Because he set his business up with little capital he still needs to buy some things he needs to prepare products like pizzas, hamburgers and others which is why now that he sees that his business is getting along he wants to find a loan that will allow him to buy ingredients to prepare the fast food and to buy work utensils to continue carrying out his activity.

In this way his business will be able to continue moving ahead and in addition to this he will be able to start to offer a wider variety of products diversifying his offer.  His dream is to move his business forward so that it will allow him to generate income with which his family can access a better quality of life and better economic opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils.

loans.name: Saifiddin

texts.ru: Сайфиддин трудолюбивый и добрый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет  пятерых детей. С малых лет он любил пасти скот и старался стать фермером. Двенадцать лет назад он купил скот и выращивал его. Он закупает крупный и мелкий рогатый скот на рынке Дупулла, перевозит их в горы на пастбище и в течении месяца откармливает затем продает за выгодную цену. Его жена помогает ему в уходе за скотом. Сайфиддин хотел бы получить займ для покупки 5 голов крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Saifiddin is a hard-working and kind man. He is married and is bringing up five children. Since his youth he has enjoyed grazing livestock and tried to become a farmer. Twelve years ago he bought livestock and began rearing it. He purchases cattle, sheep, and goats at a Dupulla market, transports them to the pastures in the mountains, fattens them there for a month, then sells them for a profitable price. His wife helps him to take care of the livestock. Saifiddin would like to receive a loan to purchase 5 heads of cattle to expand his business.  He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Gs Fray Lazaro Ii Group

texts.es:
La señora  Norma de 59 años de edad es madre soltera tiene su casa propia, comparte su casa con una hija y su nieta, es la líder del grupo solidario FRAY LAZARO # 02, se dedica a la comercialización golosinas, como papas, mango maduros, y verdes, pescado seco, también vende ropa interior y plásticos como ser. Cubetas, pailas, basureros, etc.
Doña Norma solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras, plásticos, ropa interior para comercializar  par los días de la madre, y así pretende tener mejores ganancias para salir adelante con su familia.
Esta muy contenta de seguir trabajando con PRISMA al igual que sus compañeros de grupo desea tener una experiencia mas con prisma y ella esta contenta de formar parte de este  grupo.
El sueño de Doña Norma es aumentar más su negocio y mejorar su casa.
Juan se dedica a tiempo completo a su negocio
Delsy también se dedica a su negocio a tiempo completo ya que es su fuente de ingresos.
En la fotgrafia aparece un amigo del grupo quien se retiro por motivos personales del grupo.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Norma is 59 years old and a single mother. She owns a home which she shares with her daughter and granddaughter, and she is the leader of the solidarity group Fray Lazaro # 02. She works selling foods such as potatoes, ripe and green mangoes, and dried fish. She also sells underwear and plastic products such as pails, bowls, trash bins, etc.
Norma is requesting the loan in order to purchase vegetables, plastic products, and underwear to sell for Mothers' Day. This way, she hopes to obtain better profits so that she can get ahead with her family.
She is very happy to continue working with PRISMA, as well as the other members in her group. She wants to have another experience with PRISMA and is happy to be a part of this group. 
Norma's dream is to increase her business and improve her home. 

Juan works on his business full time.
Delsy also works on hers business full time, because it is her source of income.
The picture shows a friend of the group who left the group for personal reasons.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - April, 2012

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, plastic products, and underwear to sell at her business.

loans.name: Heriberto

texts.es:
Heriberto es padre soltero de su hijo de 15 años debido a que la madre de su hijo los abandonó desde hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, y para generar sus ingresos tenía un empleo en el cual le pagaban un dinero insuficiente para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Fue entonces con el ánimo de independizarse económicamente y lograr tener una mejor calidad de vida que montó una tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar. Debido a que su tienda la montó con muy bajo capital, sus estanterías son pedazos de madera y su surtido no es muy variado, sin embargo, gracias a su buena atención ha logrado captar una buena cantidad de clientes. Es por esto que ahora que sus ventas vienen mejorando, Heriberto busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar con los que pueda ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos en su tienda y así aumentar sus ventas.

De esta manera sus ingresos se incrementarían permitiéndole tener a el y a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Su sueño es llegar a tener muy bien montada su tienda y también ofrecerle a su hijo una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Heriberto is a single dad who has a 15-year-old son. His wife abandoned them some time ago, and does not contribute to helping raise their son. Heriberto was working at a job that did not pay him sufficient income to cover his family’s living expenses, so he decided to open a general store. Since he did not have very much startup capital, his shelves are made out of wooden planks and his inventory is scarce. However, even with these disadvantages, he has still been able to grow his customer base, since he is a kind and hardworking man. As he desires to grow his business and increase his sales volume, Heriberto is requesting this loan, which he plans to put toward the purchase of merchandise to further stock his general store and hopefully increase his sales.  

If he can increase his income, he can offer his son a better quality of life. His dream is to have a well-stocked store, and to provide a high quality education for his son.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for his general store to offer his customers a greater variety of products and increase sales.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos, y para generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar tiene un cultivo de verduras el cual vende en la plaza de mercado de su municipio. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Jorge ha logrado tener muy buena cantidad de clientes que le permiten tener muy buenas ventas, y es por esto que ahora busca incrementar su cultivo buscando un préstamo que le permita comprar abonos, insecticidas y riegos para aumentar el cultivo de productos y así responder a todos los pedidos de sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante, seguirá creciendo y sus ingresos lo harán de la misma manera, permitiendo que su familia tenga mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Jorge’s married and has three children.  In order to generate income needed by his home he grows vegetables to sell in his town’s market square.  

Thanks to the good quality of his products, Jorge has managed to have a very good number of customers which means good sales and this is why he now wants to increase his crops looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy manure, insecticide and irrigation to increase his crops of products and thus be able to fill all customer orders.

In this way his business will continue to grow and his income will grow the same way allowing his family to have a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la actividad de la confección, y gracias a esta actividad logró sacar adelante a su hijo ya que era madre cabeza de familia y no tenía más ingresos que su actividad ofreciendo el servicio de confección a terceros. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus trabajos Isabel tiene muy buenos contratos para confeccionar a terceros, además de que también saca una línea de confección propia la cual vende en su municipio. Debido a que tiene grandes pedidos por confeccionar, Isabel busca que un préstamo le permita comprar telas e hilos para confeccionar grandes pedidos que tiene por parte de sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante y así podrá seguir generando ingresos con los cuales pueda seguir sosteniendo los gastos de su hogar. Además, sueña con tener un gran taller de confección donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y así ayudar a prosperar a otros.
texts.en:
Isabel has been a tailor for many years.  Thanks to this she has been able to provide a good life for her son. She is the head of her household, and her sole source of income is her work as a tailor.  Thanks to the high quality of her work, Isabel has very good contracts with her customers.  Further, she has her own clothing line which she sells in her area.  She currently has large orders she needs to fulfill, she is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy cloth and thread to fulfill these orders.

In this way her business will keep growing and thus allow her to make the income necessary to continue to keep up with her household expenses.  Further, she dreams of opening a larger tailoring business where she will be able to create jobs for people who are in greater need and thus help others prosper.

loans.use: to buy cloth and thread to fulfill large orders from her customers.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso Group

texts.es: Domitila de 35 años de edad es conviviente con 04 hijos, actualmente sigue apoyando a 03 de ellos. Domitila empezó vendiendo anticuchos en las afueras de su hogar, poco a poco fue ahorrando y con la ayuda de su pareja decidieron emprender su propio negocio la cual actualmente  cuenta con una bodega en su domicilio, aparte nos manifiesta que brinda servicio de cocina los fines de semana, de donde obtiene un ingreso extra para su hogar. Domitila se siente feliz pues con su trabajo  puede seguir apoyando a su pareja con los gastos del hogar, y mantener su negocio. Su deseo es de seguir creciendo en su negocio. El crédito que solicito lo va a destinar para capital de trabajo la cual comprara  gaseosas, cervezas y abarrotes. Domitila es socia de la Alcancía Comunal “Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso” la cual está conformado por 09 socios responsables. Ellos agradecen el crédito brindado. En la parte superior esta Guisela.
texts.en:
Domitila, 35, has a spouse and four children; she’s still supporting three of them.  Domitila started out selling 'anticuchos' [grilled, skewered meat] outside her house and gradually saved up and with help from her spouse they decided to start their own business which she now has: a home-based grocery store.  She also mentions that on weekends she provides cooking services where she earns extra income for her home.

Domitila feels happy because she’s able to continue helping her spouse with household expenses with her work and to maintain her business.  Her wish is to continue growing in her business. The loan she requested will be used as working capital; she will buy soft-drinks, beer and groceries.  

Domitila is a member of the “Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso” (Women United for Progress) communal bank which has nine responsible members.  They are grateful for the loan provided.

Guisela appears in the upper part.

loans.use: to buy beverages and groceries.

loans.name: Ricardo Enrique

texts.es: Ricardo a sus 22 años es soltero y vive en Guayaquil. Su negocio el cual es diseño en camisetas lo inicio hace 2 años. Nos cuenta que fue una idea que le surgió y la aplico. No se queja ya que le va bien. Empezó con pocas camisetas para probar el mercado y poco a poco a ganado aceptación por lo que ahora tiene muchos pedidos. Hasta el momento no a tenido problemas con la delincuencia en su sector ni algún otro percance. Con el préstamo va a comprar moldes y camisetas para sus ventas. Su meta es la expansión para que sus entregas sean por mayor.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 22, is single and lives in Guayaquil. Two years ago, he started his t-shirt design business. He tells us that the idea came to him, and he followed up on it. He can't complain because the business is doing well. He started with a few t-shirts to test the market, and little by little his designs have been accepted as seen by the fact that he has a lot of orders. He hasn't had any problems with crime or other misfortunes in his area. 

With this loan, he is going to buy printing screens and t-shirts to sell. His goal is to expand so that his income is higher.

loans.use: to buy printing screens and t-shirts.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Его женат домохозяйка и ухаживает по дому. Более 4 лет Рустам занимается производством сырого кирпича. Он кредитуется в «ИМОН Интершнешнл» уже 5 циклов. Займ помог ему на продвижения своего бизнеса и благодарен за поддержку. Кроме того он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. В бизнесе помогает ему его сын. В дальнейшем он мечтает открыть собственный автосервис, который приносит ему дополнительный доход. Данный момент Рустам запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнес скотоводства. Рустам надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Rustam is married and is bringing up three children.  His wife is a homemaker and takes care of the house. For over 4 years Rustam has been manufacturing raw bricks. He has received 5 loans through "IMON International". The loans have helped him in developing his business and he is grateful for the support. In addition, he is in business of reselling cattle.  His son helps him with his business.  In the future he is hoping to open his own car service business that will bring him additional income. Currently Rustam is requesting a loan to purchase cattle to expand his cattle rearing business.  Rustam is hoping for your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Unidas Para Vencer Group

texts.es: Doña Ada tiene 43 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Unidas para Vencer, es casada y tiene dos hijos, su esposo es comerciante, ellos residen en la comunidad de San Nicolás, de la ciudad de Juticalpa, Departamento de Olancho. Doña Ada se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas y golosinas, desde hace algunos años se dedica a esta actividad y le ha resultado muy rentable, trabaja en conjunto con su esposo, su horario de atención es de 6:00 am hasta las 6:00 pm. La ventaja es que tiene muchos clientes y el negocio le deja ganancias para cubrir sus gastos. El préstamo que doña Ada esta solicitando lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de frutas y verduras. Con la ayuda de este préstamo podrá tener mejor surtido su negocio. Su meta es lograr tener un negocio más grande, bien surtido y obtener un local más amplio. Doña Ada es cliente de FAMA desde hace 9 ciclos y hasta la actualidad ha sido puntual con sus cuotas de pagos.
texts.en:
Ada, 43, is a member of the “Unidas Para Vencer” (United to Be Victorious) communal bank.  She’s married and has two children; her husband’s a merchant.  They live in the community of San Nicolás in the city of Juticalpa, Olancho Department.

Ada has sold fruit, vegetables and snacks for several years, an activity that has turned out to be very profitable.  She works with her husband and their schedule is 6am to 6pm.  Her advantage is that she has many customers and the business generates profits to cover her costs.

The loan Ada is asking for is to buy fruit and vegetables.  With help from this loan she will have her business better stocked.  Her goal is to have a larger, well-stocked business and to get a larger locale.

Ada has been a FAMA client for nine cycles and to date has been punctual with her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Celia Marisella

texts.es: Celia vive en Paraiso y tiene 36 años. Tiene una papelería en su casa con el cual mantiene su economía. Nos cuenta que el negocio lo inicio por la necesidad al salir embarazada. Era su segundo hijo y no tenía quien se lo cuidara. Con este negocio puede atenderlos sin problemas y gastos adicionales. Atiende sola de 7:30 de la mañana hasta las 10:30 de la noche. Es madre soltera de 2 niños de 10 y 9 años que van a la escuela. El préstamo lo utilizara para la compra de cuadernos, láminas, cartulina, hojas etc. Su meta es ampliar el negocio y comprar una copiadora. Suerte Celia.
texts.en:
Celia lives in Paraiso and is 36 years old. She has a stationery store in her house that supports her financially. She tells us she started the business because she became pregnant with her second child and had no one to look after him. With this business, she can easily take care of the children and pay the additional expenses. She works alone from 7:30 in the morning until 10:30 at night. She is the single mother of two children, ages 10 and 9, who attend school. 

She will use the loan to buy notebooks, plastic sheets, cards, paper, etc. Her goal is to expand her business and buy a copier. Good luck, Celia.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, plastic sheets, cards, and paper.

loans.name: Carlos Luis

texts.es: Carlos tuvo sus inicios en la venta de artículo para el hogar desde muy joven. Empezó recorriendo las calles de la ciudad ofertando sus productos. Con los años reunió un capital y estableció en su casa el negocio. Lo maneja solo de lunes a viernes desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Los fines de semana por lo general se traslada  a la costa con la venta. Como realiza viajes su mayor preocupación es la delincuencia y el mal estado de los caminos. Es soltero pero tiene 3 hijos de 15, 7 y 5 años a los que apoya en los estudios escolares. Con el crédito comprara peluches, cuadernos, cosméticos. A futuro le gustaría construir la segunda planta en su casa.
texts.en: Carlos got his start selling household items from the time he was very young.  He started by going out into the streets of the city, offering his products for sale.  Over the years, he gathered together some capital and set up a business in his house.  He manages it by himself Mondays through Fridays, from 9am until 6pm.  He usually spends the weekends bringing products from the coast to sell.  On his trips, his main worries are crime and the bad road conditions.  He is single, but has 3 children aged 15, 7 and 5 who he supports in their education.  With this loan, he will buy stuffed animals, notebooks and cosmetics.  In the future, he would like to add a second story to his house.

loans.use: to buy stuffed animals, notebooks and cosmetics

loans.name: Garukirabakenyezi Group

texts.fr:
Sophie fait partie du groupe Garukirabakenyezi  et habite à Gitega. C’est une veuve de 49ans.  Elle a 5 enfants, âgés  de 17 à 25 ans, dont 1 étudie.

Elle fait le commerce de manioc et de la bière de banane depuis  19 ans. 

Elle est à son dix-huitième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de manioc à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Les gains de son commerce, lui permettent de payer les frais de scolarité de son enfant , les soins de santé et supporter d’autres charges.
texts.en:
Sophie is a member of the Garukirabakenyezi group and lives in Gitega.  She is a 49-year-old widow, and has five children, ages 17 to 25.  One of her children is in school.

Sophie has been selling cassava and banana beer for the past 19 years.

This is her 18th loan with Turame.  With her Kiva loan, she will increase her capital and buy a large quantity of cassava for resale, in order to make more money.

Earnings from her business will help her to pay the tuition fees for her child, to cover healthcare costs, and to take care of other expenses.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of cassava for resale.

loans.name: Gs 16 De Abril Group

texts.es:
El Señor Ricardo, tiene 40 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, Su actividad principal es la venta de frutas de temporada y pan Orneado, tiene  6 años de experiencia en el manejote su negocio, el cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, Don Ricardo esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de frutas como ser: naranjas, mandarinas, aguacates, piñas, ciruelas, mangos, sandias, melones y otros productos para la elaboración del pan orneado, para la buena atención de sus clientes, ya que al tener su negocio ubicado en la calle principal de la comunidad donde el vive le facilita sus ventas, al tener una mejor clientela, Don Ricardo también vende de manera ambulante, en su bicicleta, en algunas comunidades de la zona, el es una persona muy trabajadora y ha sabido salir adelante con su negocio que ha sido la única fuente de ingresos, con el apoyo solicitado del préstamo que reciba Don Ricardo, le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
El sueño de Don Ricardo es tener una motocicleta, para vender mas producto en otras comunidades.
La Señora Sara, se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de  golosinas Nacatamales.
El Señor Antonio, se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta granos Básicos “maíz y frijoles” El cuenta con12 años de experiencia, tiene 3 hijos. 
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Ricardo is 40 years old and has three children. His main activity is selling seasonal fruit and oven-baked bread. He has six years of experience managing his business and counts on his wife's support.
Ricardo is requesting the loan in order to purchase fruit, such as oranges, tangerines, avocados, pineapple, plums, mangoes, watermelon, melon, and other products to make oven-baked bread, so that he can offer his customers good service. Since his business is located on the main street in the community where he lives, this makes sales easier by creating a broader customer base. 
Ricardo also sells his products on the street, going out on his bicycle to several communities in the area. He is a very hard worker and has found a way to move forward with his business, which has been his only source of income. The support afforded by this loan will help Ricardo have a better business so that he can earn a better income to cover home expenses and give his family a better quality of life.
Ricardo's dream is to have a motorcycle so that he can sell more products in other communities.

Sara works selling mainly the food "nacatamales."
Antonio works selling mainly basic grains, rice, and beans. He has twelve years of experience and has three children. 

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - April, 2012

loans.use: to purchase fruit such as oranges, tangerines, avocados, pineapple, plums, mangoes, watermelon, melon, and other products for his business.

loans.name: Gs Las Delicias Group

texts.es:
La  Señora Santos, tiene 60 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo y es madre soltera, Su actividad principal es la venta de abarrotería (pulpería) desde hace más de 5 Años, Doña Santos, esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de productos como: azúcar, manteca, jabón, refrescos, carnes, papel higiénico, maíz, frijoles y otros productos para la buena atención de sus clientes, ya que al tener su negocio ubicado en su hogar le permite realizar a su vez oficios domésticos sin descuidar su hogar y de esta manera también puede atender a sus clientes, con el apoyo solicitado del préstamo que reciba Doña Santos, le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, y ayudarla a salir adelante, ella trabaja afanosamente  para manejar todo en orden en su hogar y negocio.
Doña Santos uno de sus sueños es ampliar su  negocios y vender una variedad de producto, gracias al apoyo que se le brinde subiría un peldaño para lograr su sueño.
La Señora Haydee, se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de Cosméticos.
La Señora Maritza, se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de granos básicos.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Santos is 60 years old, has one son, and is a single mother. Her main activity for more than five years has been selling groceries at her small store. Santos is applying for the loan to buy products such as sugar, lard, soap, soft drinks, meats, toilet paper, corn, beans, and other products for serving her customers well. 

Having her business located in her home allows her to carry out household chores at the same time. This way she can also serve her customers without neglecting her household. 

With the support requested through the loan that Santos will receive, she will invest in having a better business and so earn better income. This is so that she can cover the household expenses, give her family a better quality of life and help them succeed. She works tirelessly to keep everything in order in her household and business.

One of Santos' dreams is to expand her businesses, and sell a variety of products. Thanks to the support she has been offered, she will climb a step toward achieving her dream.

Haydee has a small retail business, and her main activity is selling cosmetics.

Maritza has a small retail business, and her main activity is selling staple grains.

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: To buy sugar, lard, soap, soft drinks, meats, toilet paper, corn, beans and other products for her business.

loans.name: Jaime Alberto

texts.es:
Jaime es una persona muy trabajadora y para generar los ingresos para su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos aprendió empíricamente la actividad de la venta de frutas y verduras en la plaza de mercado de su municipio. Hace un tiempo que Jaime tiene su puesto de venta de frutas y verduras y gracias a la buena atención que ofrece sus clientes cada vez van en aumento, es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita comprar surtido de frutas y verduras y unas canastas para organizar las frutas y las verduras en su negocio.

De esta manera podrá seguir ofreciendo una buena variedad de productos a sus clientes haciendo que cada vez su negocio sea más atractivo. Además, espera que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente permitiéndole brindar en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Su sueño es crecer con su negocio y expandirlo para generar empleo para los más necesitados.
texts.en:
Jaime is a very hardworking person.  In order to provide for his wife and four children, he has learned by trial and error the business of selling fruits and vegetables in his local market.  He has had his stall for some time now, and thanks to the good service he provides to his customers, his business has steadily grown.  It is for this reason that he is seeking a loan that will allow him to supply his business with more fruits and vegetables and some baskets to organize these items.

In this way he will be able to continue to offer a good variety of products to his customers and make his business more and more attractive.  Further, he hopes that his income will increase considerably, allowing him to bring a better quality of life to his family and better opportunities for economic progress.  His dream is to grow and expand his business to the point where he can create employment for those who need it most.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for his business and some baskets to organize these items.

loans.name: Olinda Magali

texts.es: Olinda tiene 40 años y vive en el Suburbio parte sur urbana de Guayaquil. Empezó su negocio ingresando en diferentes cursos de manualidades, primero fue en fomix luego de cerámica. Lo hizo porque le gusta pero cuando su esposo la abandono inicio el negocio por la necesidad de ingresos para sus gastos. El trabajo lo realiza sola pero en ocasiones le ayuda una amiga con la cerámica. Como su sector en un poco peligroso si le preocupa la delincuencia pero hasta nuestra entrevista no había tenido ningún problema. Vive con sus hijos que tienen  15 y 17 años y asisten al colegio fiscal. Con el préstamo va a comprar perlas, chaquiras, fomix, pintura. Sus metas y sueños es tener un local donde exponer sus productos para mejorar sus ventas
texts.en:
Olinda, 40, lives in Suburbio in the southern part of Guayaquil.  She started her business by taking several manual arts classes, first in Foamy and then in ceramics.  She did it because she likes it but when her husband abandoned her she started the business because of the need for income to cover her expenses.  She does the work alone but sometimes a girlfriend helps with the ceramics.  

Because her neighborhood is a bit dangerous she does worry about crime but up to our interview she’d had no problems of any kind.  She lives with her children who are 15 and 17 years old and attend public school.  

She will use the loan to buy pearls, sequins, Foamy and paint.  Her goals and dreams are to have a locale in which to display her products in order to improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy crafts supplies.

loans.name: Isabel Beronica

texts.es: Isabel tiene un negocio de venta de manualidad en Fomix. Siempre le a gustado las manualidades por ese motivo decidió vender sorpresas para cumpleaños. Como es madre soltera esto le permite cuidar de sus hijos y mantener su hogar. Su horario de atención es de 7 de la mañana a 11 de la noche de lunes a sábados. Isabel nos cuenta que si tiene problemas en el invierno ya que bajan sus ventas por el daño que sufren las calles de su barrio lo que impide la movilización. Tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 11 años que asisten a la escuela. El préstamo lo implementara en la compra de materiales para su negocio como fomix, pintura y moldes. Su meta próxima es ampliar su negocio construyendo en un espacio baldío que tiene en su casa.
texts.en:
Isabel has a business making crafts and foam art. She has always liked hands-on work, a trend that has led her to sell crafts for birthday parties and surprises. She is a single mother, and provides her family's only source of income. She works from 7:00 am until 11:00 pm, Monday through Saturday. Her sales are typically down in winter, since streets are less navigable due to bad weather, and less people are out and about. 

She has two children, ages 7 and 11, both of whom are in school. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase materials for making her crafts, including foam, paint and molds. One of her goals is to convert an empty space she has in her house into a larger workshop for her business.

loans.use: to purchase foam, paint and molds.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De Huampani Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Las Triunfadoras De Huampani” es un grupo conformado por 08 personas responsables y comprometidas con el Programa-Prosperidad, siendo la gran mayoría vecinos de la zona. Seferina tiene 55 años de edad es casada con 05 hijos independientes y ella es la que preside al grupo. Seferina se dedica a la venta de comidas la cual lleva más de 01 años en dicho negocio. Gracias a su trabajo a podido mejorar su vivienda y apoyar con los gastos del hogar. Actualmente apoya a una de sus hijas. Su mayor deseo es de tener un local en un lugar céntrico donde pueda ofrecer sus comidas. En esta oportunidad solicito el crédito para la compra de un carrito sanguchero, pues piensa emprender su nuevo negocio de ventas de frituras. La Alcancía Comunal “Las Triunfadoras De Huampani” están agradecidos con el crédito brindado. Seferina se encuentra ubicada en la parte  de adelante y viste un polo color azul.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Las Triunfadoras De Huampani” is a group that comprises 8 responsible people who are committed to Programa-Prosperidad. Most of the group are neighbors from the area. Seferina, 55, is married, has 5 independent children, and heads the group. For more than a year, Seferina has been selling food as her business. The work has helped her improve her home and pay her household expenses. Now she is helping one of her daughters. 

Her greatest wish is to have a centrally-located space where she can offer her food. At this time, she is requesting a loan to buy a sandwich cart as she is thinking of starting a new business selling fried foods. The communal bank “Las Triunfadoras De Huampani” is grateful for the credit extended to the members. Seferina is seated at the front of the photo and is wearing a blue t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy a sandwich cart.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Il est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants.
Koffi travaille comme photocopieur. Il fait des saisies de texte depuis 2010. Il exerce son activité dans une boutique à ses clients et sa difficulté est la concurrence sur le terrain . 
Koffi a requis son second  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des machines pour photocopie. Il veut créer un autre centre de traitement de texte. 
Dans les prochaines années, Koffi voudrait créer un centre de cyber , se marier et avoir des enfants.
texts.en:
Koffi is a man aged 35. He is single and has no children. He works as a photocopy-maker and has been doing text input since 2010. He does his work in a shop for his clients and his difficulty is the competition in the field. 

Koffi has requested his second loan from WAGES in order to buy photocopiers. He wants to create another word processing center. In the coming years, Koffi would like to open up an internet center, to marry, and to have children.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Alirio Alberto

texts.es:
Alirio ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en la vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza suficiente para salir adelante y continuar progresando junto con su familia. Luego de buscar por diferentes regiones del país oportunidades laborales, llegó al municipio donde actualmente reside y allí tuvo la oportunidad de montar una tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar. Gracias a este negocio genera los ingresos suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, por esto siempre lo atiende de la mejor manera posible para que su negocio siga creciendo y cada vez tenga más clientes. Debido a que su negocio lo montó con muy bajo capital, no cuenta con suficiente variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar para ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos y así poder tener unas mejores ventas.

Su sueño es llegar a tener un minimercado donde pueda generar empleo para las demás personas, además de poder brindar a su familia una estabilidad económica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alirio has had to overcome many adversities in his life, but without a doubt, he has always had enough strength to move on and continue making progress alongside his family.  After looking in different regions of his country for opportunities to work, he arrived in the municipality where he currently resides, and there he was able to open a general store where he sells everyday goods.
